backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining user profiles, store data structures, admin recovery logic, support chat, and access‑controlled operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module passing through previous state while defining types aligned with backend storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the root div and initializes the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, theme provider, and global toaster notifications.
Route guard enforcing admin access and offering a navigation link to the admin recovery page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity actions with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to set up their profile name.
frontend/src/components/books/BookCard.t: Displays a book card with cover, title, author, price, availability badge, and links to the book page.
frontend/src/components/books/CoverImage: Renders a book cover image with a fallback SVG placeholder on load error.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable component for displaying empty-state UI with icon, text, and optional actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Shows footer with social links, customer service chat, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with navigation, balance display, cart button, and login support based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Page wrapper including header, footer, routed content, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Reusable page container applying max-width and padding classes.
frontend/src/components/library/BookCont: Dialog displaying purchased book content with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/support/Customer: Modal chat interface for submitting support messages and viewing threaded conversations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRecovery.ts: Mutation hook for triggering admin-access recovery with custom error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving user profiles and checking admin status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: Hooks to fetch token balance and mint tokens, with cache invalidation on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooks.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, adding, updating, and deleting books via an actor API, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Implements cart-related queries and mutations including fetching cart items, modifying cart contents, checkout, and deriving cart totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and AuthClient setup through a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibrary.ts: Builds a user's owned book library from orders and books, and fetches purchased book content.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Provides hooks for fetching single orders, user orders, and all orders through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for central query organization.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetStore.ts: Mutation hook to reset backend store and invalidate all related React Query caches with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupportChat.ts: Implements user and admin support chat queries and mutations including sending messages, fetching messages, and replying.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme colors, dark mode variables, and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a classnames helper merging clsx with tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCatalogPag: Renders the admin catalog with book listing, add/edit dialogs, and actions for updating or deleting books.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Provides the main admin dashboard layout with tab navigation to catalog, orders, minting, support, and settings pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMintPage.t: Allows admins to mint GLDT tokens by submitting a principal ID and token amount.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all customer orders with item details, totals, and timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRecoveryPa: Handles admin access recovery using Internet Identity and a recovery mutation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Provides store reset functionality with warnings and success/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportInb: Shows customer support message threads and allows admins to reply to messages.
frontend/src/pages/BookDetailsPage.tsx: Page for displaying book details, handling add‑to‑cart, and showing loading or not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart, allows item removal, and navigates to checkout, with states for unauthenticated and empty carts.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Shows a searchable list of available books with loading states and filtered results.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow including balance checks, order creation, and navigation to confirmation, with login and empty-cart guards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides a hero section and displays featured books pulled from the available catalog.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: Displays the user's purchased books and allows reading by fetching book content, with login and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order details after purchase, including items, total, and navigation to library or catalog.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting token amounts, principals, and timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/orderId.ts: Generates unique order IDs using timestamp and random values.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Parses a principal string into a Principal object and throws an error if invalid.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash params, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, issues, features, and architectural notes for an e‑book storefront with crypto payments.
